## Basic R Code

```{r}
# A simple calculation
x <- 1:1000
mean(x)
```

## Plot Example

```{r}
# Basic plot
plot(x, x^2, type = "b", col = "blue", main = "x vs x squared")
```

The mean of x is `r mean(x)`.
